product_title: Tassel Convertible Vegan Leather Envelope Clutch
product_description: Swingy tassel charms add to the charm of a boxy faux-leather clutch topped with an optional chain strap for when you want to carry it hands-free.

Swingy tassel charms add to the charm of a boxy faux-leather clutch topped with an optional chain strap for when you want to carry it hands-free.
